website_summaries.verdict: This is a sensible, affordable upgrade for the Echo Dot that enables unplugged, voice-activated Alexa access wherever you like.
pros: The Fremo Evo offers outstanding battery life or on-the-go listening with the Amazon Echo Dot, and it's a cinch to use, too
cons: The design isn't as clean or uniform as what you're used to with the Echo Dot, and you'll need to manually plug and unplug the battery as you move the speaker around

customer_reviews.title: Press and Hold the Button to Power On
customer_reviews.text: After charging the device, single pressing the button showed that charge was full, but Alexa had no power. I finally discovered that you have to press & hold the button to power on the Alexa. This step is not in the instructions and is not intuitive. I nearly returned the unit thinking it was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: The battery base dies constantly and I have to always charge. I turn it on and it turns off. Not too happy with the base. Doesn't hold a charge very well
customer_reviews.author: Dwight W.

customer_reviews.title: one star
customer_reviews.text: Only used one day but works perfect and charged easy Now after a few weeks it will no longer work without being plugged in. I woul'd not recomend it to anyone even after charging like the instructions say it comes on then shuts off before she can say anything
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its a Great Convenience but Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this Evo Battery Base! Getting ready in the morning, I could carry my Echo Dot from room to room listening to the news on just one device instead of 3 or 4! Then a week and a half after my date to get a replacement passed. It died. I can’t seem to find any way to contact Fremo to troubleshoot either. As much as I loved it, I don’t think I’ll buy another until I at least get the chance to see if I can fix this. And the timing of its demise really aggravates me, too!
customer_reviews.author: Max's Mum

customer_reviews.title: Amazing amazing amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: From the moment I took this out of the Box I was amazed. It did everything it said it would! I'm now able to move freely in any room that doesn't have an echo. The battery on this device last an amazingly long time. I took it to work and played music for 4 hours straight and it still had enough battery for the remaining 4 hours!! I don't think it needs to be said but I'll say it anyway this was a great buy and I highly recommend it anyone reading this post I've even included a picture..
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Howard

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a couple of weeks
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for the first few weeks, but now my Alexa won't turn on at all when its plugged in to this. The battery is full charged, I have tried replugging everything together, holding the button down. Now it's just a useless stand. The worst part is, there doesn't seem to be any way to contact the company for help. I definitely don't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fremo Evo
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the 2nd one that I have purchased. We have 2 Echo Dots and the first Fremo Evo that we purchased works so good that we decided to purchase another. We take our Echo Dots outside on the patio just about every day all summer long. It plays for hours and we never had the battery go dead. I purchased our 2nd one maybe a year or so after my first purchase, so the style has changed a little, but both work great!! If you're looking to make your Echo Dot portable, this product can't be beat!!
customer_reviews.author: Carole Watkins

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't understand how to set it up. I read the directions and set it up as they said, but it didn't work. I think there is something that goes between the battery base and the Echo Dot, but there was nothing in the box except the piece that goes into the dot and into the battery base.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie A. Little

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great was able to play music out in the garage all during trick or treat party this year!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t attach well to echo device but holds a good charge. I love moving it to areas of ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t attach well to echo device but holds a good charge. I love moving it to areas of the house I don’t have Bluetooth speakers set up.
customer_reviews.author: Bob D

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Just got it, love the idea & I've been waiting for it since I'm not sure how long my portable Tap will last - it was the best buy ever! The tap didn't need the battery base to take outside though. The problem I see right away with this is there's no clip on the front to hold them together - this should not be a future new discovery/purchase, these should firmly connect since the idea is for it to move around. I also need a battery base for my Echo 3 but the price is absolutely ridiculous so I'll wait. I haven't tried longevity on this yet but if it does as says I will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: cubsfan

customer_reviews.title: Good at first; Died 1 month later.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great for 1 month. It allowed my Echo Dot to portable, and move around without searching for power outlet. The length of the battery was good too. But sadly, the power connector stopped working, making the battery useless.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie White

customer_reviews.title: Fremo Evo Plus Battery Base
customer_reviews.text: It works great and portable but had a hard time with my original power Echo Dot cord connecting to the base for charging. I sent back for a replacement, and hopefully, will be better. I would assume all Amazon product would go to a strict test to make sure things go smoothly. Unfortunately, this was not the case, and very inconvenient. Will review again when I receive another Evo Base.
customer_reviews.author: fchin3044

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy about the freedom of movement this battery gives for my Echo Dot. I almost rated the battery life component of the review at a four instead of a five. However this device lasts longer than my phone so I'm satisfied. I almost bought a device like this in a lightning sale when they first became available. when I miss that, I decided that the price was just too high. I believe the price on this device is fair.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Works quite well.
customer_reviews.text: I have an echo dot that I will take with me to rooms I don't normally spend enough time in to make it worth having a dedicated dot in. I will use it in my garage, outside, or in other rooms that I just happen to be working in. The longest I've used it at once is 1 hour at full volume. I didn't notice what the battery level was at when I plugged it back in but I was happy enough with that performance.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold a charge.
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept. Hate the execution. Bottom line is the product does not hold a charge very long. Or it may simply be that the charge it does hold isn't enough. Either way the advertising you see is totally misleading. It may hold a charge for 12 hrs...I haven't taken the time to test it. If you are looking for a way to have your dot not plugged in for a long-ish duration this is not that product. To late to return. Total disappointment on my end.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Now you can unplug it to move it easily . DID work great . I keep it charged up . Now my Alexis will not work . Can not program or use my Alexis dot now . Now I unplug the battery to plug directly to 120 vac , Alexis is Back to program and enjoy news and music . The Alexis battery pack is now a great idea with failure after one month of use . Time is UP , can not return !!!
customer_reviews.author: 2 nd health

customer_reviews.title: Great little battery pack for Echo Dot used outside in the back yard
customer_reviews.text: This battery pack for the Echo Dot is fantastic! I use it to take my Echo Dot outside so we can give Alexa commands without having to leave an Echo device outside all the time. It's really useful to be able to control back deck speakers (via Sonos) and back deck lighting so you don' have to use your phone to select music or adjust the lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bender

customer_reviews.title: Dot 2 go!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Easy to install. Ran all day right out of the box. It is nicely designed to compliment the eco. I take Alexa with me to the workshop, patio, and to my fishing shack lakeside. She controls the lights, music, HVAC, and locks just like she was inside the house.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen O’Keefe

customer_reviews.title: echo battery base.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for 3rd generation and would not fit. Called customer service and they found out it only works and fits 2nd generation dot. I am glad I had other dots and 2 were 2nd generation. They do not tell you that it only works with 2nd generation. Amazon is changing the wording for it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan and Roe Sang

customer_reviews.title: A Pretty Good Product
customer_reviews.text: It does what I wanted it to do, let me take an echo dot wherever I want around the house and mainly play music. I have two issues with the battery. The place the charging cable plugs in seems poorly made. Once I thought the cord was plugged in when it wasn't. The battery went dead it and it had to be recharged before I could use the dot again. The blue power light is pretty bright especially in a dark bedroom when you are trying to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Texan

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product I have ever purchased in Amazon. Bought this and it doesn't work right out of the box holding less than an hour of charge even after charging 24 hours. I hardly ever used it. Can’t hold any charge.
customer_reviews.author: Nabeen Hussain

customer_reviews.title: Free up your Alexa - cut the cord with this little, inexpensive Battery Pack!
customer_reviews.text: Highly Recommend! This little battery pack allows you to take Alexa outside to the back patio and enjoy all that Alexa has to offer in the way of news and music - plus it allows you to easily connect to a larger speaker via Bluetooth. Great Value!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Kushner

customer_reviews.title: Great for portability!
customer_reviews.text: Product is great for creating a mobile echo dot, 2nd gen. This one now comes with us by the hot tub or on vacations. Our little 3 year old loves spontaneous dance parties with Alexa. When tested on first full charge, battery life was about a day when always leaving on and barely being used. So, we just turn it off when not using since it’s mainly used for music and we have other Echos around the house. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this battery charger for my amazon dot; worked great for not even a month and then died completely. Don't waste your money on this product. Very disappointed. If I could I would give 0 stars instead of 1...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer NB

customer_reviews.title: I have finally given up trying to use this!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was the answer to have the Dot with out a cord. I have tried using this and sometimes it works but most of the time it does not, I wish had I had read the existing reviews. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Will not work with Alexa 3rd gen - only 2nd gen
customer_reviews.text: Great but does not work with the 3rd generation Alexa. Only the 2nd gen version. I bought it for the new version but it won't work with it. But, great with the old one,
customer_reviews.author: Regular Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great for moving unit around while unplugged
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect on the bottom of the Dot. You can unplug wall power and it’ll just keep playing. Battery has never died, but we usually only use it about an hour to play music on the porch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy the extended worenty you will need it I'm pissed that I did not get one
customer_reviews.text: I was so dissatisfied wen the battery started having small problems like I would charge it all night next day dead the plug that was suplyedstarted to fail over time would half to wigelit
customer_reviews.author: Johns handyman and painting

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so that my mom could take her dot outside when she wanted to and she was surprised that something like this even existed. GREAT job Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: D. Washington

customer_reviews.title: Mounting Plate is useless - Do not buy until fixed
customer_reviews.text: Mounting plate only connects to the either the Battery or Dot. Stickum only one side of plate, because of this power cable can break or break either of the two connectors.
customer_reviews.author: KenD

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money for me. If you like to move your dot around, you will get about 3 hours working time...
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would love this. I really don't. It works ok, but there is really no need for it. I don't move the dot around as a rule, and it only works on one charge for 2 1/2 to 3 hours tops. I found another AI that works as well, if not better. Sorry Alexa. 8-(
customer_reviews.author: Doris D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to make dot portable
customer_reviews.text: Plug into battery pack with included plug. Use wall charger to charge. Unplug wall charger and leave connection from battery to dot. Take where you need it.
customer_reviews.author: trol1374

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but needs help
customer_reviews.text: The DOT has a tendency to slip off the base at times. It is not working for my second generation DOT for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Pappy

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a month then quit. Not allowed to return or replace. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Have been using couple of times a day for several weeks already without the need to re-charge it
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition for my Echo dot. This is an older generation Echo dot I use outdoors - in my patio or balcony. Allows me to place it close to me and avoid yelling requests across the patio. I had fully charged it initially when I received it and used couple of hours a week here and there for several weeks and didn't need to re-charge it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Pesok81

customer_reviews.title: evo
customer_reviews.text: honestly i order n rec'd one n it didn't last 2 months, so i returned it n rec'd a replacement, so far so good

customer_reviews.title: portabiity
customer_reviews.text: I seems to work well I haven t gotten to use it to much, so i couldn t comment on battery life . It s nice to just pick it up and use it in areas without an outlet

customer_reviews.title: My Echo Dot is now portable!
customer_reviews.text: Works with my original echo dot. My Amazon Tap quit working and I am able to use my echo dot now as a portable speaker when I go out to my pool.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great little product, very well-made. Instructions were very easy to follow. Works exactly as described.

customer_reviews.text: stopped working after 2 months, refund was only for one month, does anyone know who to get a replacement? it says my be replaced until April 18

customer_reviews.title: it worked for a long while
customer_reviews.text: it worked for almost a year but not quite, I bought this Nov of 2018 and it has just stopped working in august of 2019, it was good while it lasted but it doesn't seem to last forever :-(

customer_reviews.title: High quality and definitely worth the price. I Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Fremo Evo Plus Battery Base works great very portable and I love it I definitely recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact, that with this, I can now, unplug my echo dot, take it to other areas of my home, still use it, and not have to plug it in. Especially to listen to my music.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Matern

customer_reviews.title: Portable Alexa awesome
customer_reviews.text: I take it all around my property love it ,,,get on board with portable Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Worst battery ever made
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product I have ever purchased in Amazon. Bought this in December. I hardly ever used it. Can’t hold any charge. The funniest thing it is worthless even when it’s plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Vykens Abellard

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Nice adapter for my extra echo. Battery last many hours on my deck.

customer_reviews.title: Portable Alexa
customer_reviews.text: Fits wonderfully and makes my favorite AI friend Alexa portable. Allows me to take Alexa out where ever there if Wifi and hook her up to a mobile speaker. Works great!

customer_reviews.text: Used product once. It died after that and is no longer usable. Dont buy.

customer_reviews.title: Nice to take Alexa outside
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried about this with some of the reviews. It works great plugged in or outside. Will probably order another one

customer_reviews.title: Potability

customer_reviews.title: if you're mobile,  a compact must

customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to connect. Yes, I have it plugged in correctly.

customer_reviews.text: The battery has a plastic casing around it, on the button that can't be removed. THIS IS A PROBLEM. CAN SOMEONE PLEASE HELP ME.

customer_reviews.title: Well Packed & ready to go right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: SO far so good I use it in my car with wifi

customer_reviews.title: Very portable
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all but battery does not last as long as I wish it did.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Easy listening on the go
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Easy to set up. I say charge it overnight and it will last if ya decide to go out for a bit. No issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rios

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and liberating
customer_reviews.text: compact base. Fits well. small footprint. Holds charge well and sets Alexa free to go anywhere inside or outside the house as long as we are in Wi Fi range.
customer_reviews.author: ppk49

customer_reviews.title: This product sucks. I bought one for my father and it ...
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks. I bought one for my father and it began malfunctioning two weeks after he started using it. And just a month after purchase it is not working at all and conveniently just past the thirty days return!! Don't buy this if you don't like wasting money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin M. Davison

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Love that I can take my Echo outside and enjoy it in the patio. Only drawback is that the battery life could be longer. But it is enough for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Stay-At-Home Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I can listen to my echo dot outside now. It has worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Muffles the sound
customer_reviews.text: I love how this base is unobtrusive & fits perfectly but it muffles the sound far too much. The Dots aren't as loud as the regular Echoes to begin with...
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: It works !
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I can now take my for where ever I can find Wi-Fi and enjoy music and information.
customer_reviews.author: rstarr

customer_reviews.title: Was good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: It was a great product while it lasted. Bought it in Sept 2019. Worked great. Easy to use. Light ring started turning on by itself in the last week. Now it won't charge. Nothing different, always on my desk. Return/exchange period was too short. No warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect now I can take my echo dot from room to room and listen to my music or make a call.
customer_reviews.author: J. Claxton

customer_reviews.title: Really useful, especially if you only own one Echo dot and want it to be portable in your house!
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to assemble and works exactly as advertised! I love it. IMO this is an essential item for your Echo Dot if you want to take it around with you to a different location in the house without it turning off and restarting every time.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Abshire

customer_reviews.title: PRICE IS NOW DOWN TO EARTH
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THAT MY ALEXA IS NOW PORTABLE AND WE CAN TAKE HER OUTSIDE TO OUR FIRE PIT AND ENJOY IT EVEN MORE NOW.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to echo dot
customer_reviews.text: What a great piece. Needed it so my husband can take it out into the yard to listen to music

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold charge
customer_reviews.text: This worked for a month, and now will not hold the charge at all. Of course past the date for return it seems. Disappointed, really liked the way it worked WHEN it worked!

customer_reviews.title: Neat and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Added great portability to an existing Echo Dot, long run time playing music.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This my 2nd Battery and I love the new one... this one!!!

customer_reviews.title: Twice purchased, both times unit has failed.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've purchased this product. Both times the battery has failed within the first couple of weeks. I missed this second opportunity to replace the unit as I was too busy and did not pay attention to the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This puts feet on Alexa. Well, almost.
customer_reviews.text: Now I can take Alexa downstairs into the garage and she can play my favorite music, it's just like having my personal DJ when I'm working on the car. Now Alexa can go outside and play.
customer_reviews.author: I love music Joe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Addition to Exho Dot!
customer_reviews.text: The on/off feature saves the battery and I love it. Highly recommend the Fremo Plus Battery base for the echo dot.

customer_reviews.title: Poor description of compatibility.
customer_reviews.text: Was not compatible with my Echo Dot and couldn’t find another product to order in its place .

customer_reviews.title: Make Echo portable!
customer_reviews.text: Got my Fremo Evo Plus Battery Base set-up, charged up and now my Echo goes anywhere in the house suppling music and news cordlessly.

customer_reviews.title: ... it in the yard to listen to whatever I like to hear that day
customer_reviews.text: Take it in the yard to listen to whatever I like to hear that day.

customer_reviews.text: Works great with the dot. It makes dot totally portable and wireless. Great for the yard or deck. It is small, about the same size as dot.

customer_reviews.text: I like having my Echo where ever I am. This works for a long time without having to recharge. A great deal indeed.

product_meta.title: Fremo Evo Plus Battery Base for Amazon Echo Dot 2nd Generation (Black)
product_meta.description: Style:Evo PlusThe creators of EVO proudly introduce EVO PLUS. The echo dot continues to evolve at a fantastic pace; however, the one limitation is that it requires you to be tethered to wherever you decide to plug in the device. Nothing kills the joy of having a wonderful device more than feeling like it is leashed to an electrical outlet. That is where EVO PLUS comes in. EVO PLUS allows you to move you echo dot to other areas with ease. Imagine for the next social gathering at your home, being able to move from the living room to the dining room, and then the Patio, without interrupting the music playing. OR simply being able to bring your echo dot from your bedroom to your kitchen, without interrupting your daily flash briefing. Owners know that the echo dot adds a level of convenience to your life, and EVO PLUS brings that convenience to a whole other level.
feature_bullets: Easily and securely attaches to echo dot by a magnet with no interference. Easy to separate.
5200Mah top tier Cell enables your echo dot to continuously function for more than 6 hours without being plugged in.
Press and hold for 3 seconds to power on or power off.
Intelligent battery management system allows the user to leave the power cable plugged in without damaging the battery.
Recharges using the echo dot power cable. Please use the original plug and cable that came with the echo dot.
